message.content:
I need to identify the amount of tax an entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period from the financial statements.

In this case, I need to look for tax-related line items in the financial statements:

Looking at the income statement, I can see:
- "Tax Expense" line shows 287762.05 for the reporting period ending 2024-01-29
- This represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during this reporting period

Additionally, the balance sheet shows:
- "Taxes Payable" of 287762.05 as of 2024-01-29
- This confirms the tax liability amount

The cash flow statement also includes:
- "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" of 287762.05

All these items consistently show the same value, confirming that 287762.05 is the total tax amount the entity is expected to pay.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '287762.05'} }
```
